1. ...She'd lost a test subject. (Believing Faith's gas to have killed you, she gives you to Faith to 'dispose' of. Faith soon discovers that you haven't actually died and decides to take care of you... whether you like it or not.)

2. ...You were unconscious. (Already knowing this was the likely outcome, Yumi sets the jar aside and continues her testing with Faith. Later on, she might bring you out for a new experiment, or perhaps even for her own personal entertainment.)

3. ...You were faking it. (Suspecting you were only pretending to be unconscious, Yumi decides to punish you by giving you, and the rest of her test subjects, to Nina, the very athletic track and cross-country star of Chadwell and the third member of the science group, to keep for the weekend.)
1431.title: Farting Faith's First Test Subject

1433.content:
The jars in the backpack banged and clattered as Yumi walked down the hall. Even through the distance, fabric, and glass, you could hear the sounds of cheering. As the giant scientist girl continued her pace, the loud noises intensified. She was walking towards the stadium!

Yumi ducked into a small janitor's closet in the side of the hall and closed the door. She unslung her backpack from her shoulder and unzipped the main compartment. Down below, features warped by the glass, one of her tiny test subjects blinked in the light. Yumi reached down and gripped the jar with one enormous hand, carefully setting the bag down with her other. She turned the jar, inspecting its occupant. It tried to back away from her, but the rotation of the jar and the irregular surface of the bottom of the jar caused it to trip and fall. This one was the new one, wasn't it? She needed to cut it off from its friends. With a quick, forceful twist, the cold logical girl unscrewed the lid of the jar before reaching in and grabbing the new test subject, enveloping it in her curled fist. She brought the struggling tiny mascot to her face and looked at it intently. Two tiny black devices lay inside either of the mouse costume's "ears". Yumi lodged a fingernail in the left ear, carefully positioning it under the device... and flicked. There was the smallest of sparks as the micro-sized speaker was sent flying off. She repeated the process with the right ear. Now the test subject was cut off. The Chadwell science officer pocketed the mascot as she resealed the jar and placed it back in the bag, zipped the bag closed, and walked out of the closet. Then, as she entered the stadium, she surreptitiously grabbed the diminutive mascot from her pocket and hid it in her hand. She walked down the steps, found an empty space by a college student who was texting her friend to come watch the game.

You lay there, trapped in the hot, tight confines of the giantess's hand. You could feel her pulse, silently expanding and contracting her hand. You heard her booming voice say. "One, please." before her grip tightened like a vice and you blacked out from the crushing pressure.

When you woke up, you were lying in the point of a soft brown triangle. Above, there was a massive pale red cylinder. A mixture of red and yellow liquids came oozing down the sides. The whole thing smelled very... familiar... Oh no. You were in a hot dog! You panicked, and tried crawling away out either end, but the sticky mixture of mustard and ketchup slid down the sides of the bun and pooled at the bottom, effectively trapping you. The hot dog itself was too low for you to stand, and too heavy for you to lift. You could only watch through the tiny hole at the end of the bun as the enormous Yumi piloted the hot dog to her face. Her mouth opened, revealing an endless red cavern. Already you could see little pools of saliva forming in the basin of her mouth as the food drew nearer, nearer...

Yumi bit down on the stadium hot dog, tearing off a large chunk as she drew back. You were mere millimeters away from freedom, but the ketchup and mustard bogged you down, and by the time you reached the edge, the Japanese girl was returning for another bite -- it was too late. The hot dog entered her mouth. Her fiery, smelly breath washed over you. Then her teeth came down, severing your section of the hot dog from the outside world. As her saliva welled up to meet the bun, her gigantic tongue shoved the hot dog sideways so her teeth could pulverize and tear it more easily. The now-shredded stadium food toppled into the waiting ocean of spit. Everything around you was being saturated or ground into mush. You tried desperately to make it to the exit, but then Yumi closed her lips. Her tongue tilted back, and the massive mound that had once been a hot dog slid toward the back of her mouth, where her powerful throat muscles pulled it down her esophagus and into the abyss. Still you doggedly ran for her front teeth, and a slight tremor from your captress confirmed that she knew it was you in there. Something entered through her lips. A straw. Suddenly all the air came rushing back to her throat in a sudden wind, and a flash flood of soda came streaming out of the straw in a tsunami of carbonation. You couldn't hold on any longer. The tidal wave of soda swept you up along with some remaining bits of semi-digested mush, and you were sent into her stomach.

You landed somewhat softly on the former hot dog, sinking a little as the soda came rushing in and saturated the area. As you tried to pull yourself out of the glop, you considered the lake of stomach acids surrounding you. The way you saw it, you could either dive in and hope to avoid any masses of digested matter once you reach the intestines, or you could stay where you were and wait for Yumi to eat a bit more, so you could maybe form a cocoon and wait to escape until you've gotten to her bowels...

What do you choose?

1. Stomach Swimming -- You dive into the Chadwell girl's stomach juices, hoping to find the opening to her small intestine before the next wave of stomach matter sweeps you up in its wake.

2. Literal Meat Shield -- You try to form a defense against the acids before you head further on. Fortunately, Yumi's not done with her food. Unfortunately, you'll have to avoid being buried by it if you want to use it.

3. Scientist With A Stomach Bug -- You don't get to decide, as that hot dog you came in on is disagreeing with Yumi...
1433.title: Yumi's Stadium Snack

15.content:
With that, Sylvia suddenly reached out and grabbed you with her giant hand. Then she lifted you up and leaned forward before letting go. For one terrifying instant, you thought you would land between her pants and panties, or worse, between her butt cheeks, but instead you landed inside her open back pocket. As you scrambled to get your bearings, you saw a massive hand eclipse the opening as the robotics captain rebuttoned her pocket, sealing off all light save for two holes on either side of the flap. Sylvia's voice boomed down to you, "Sorry if you're surprised, new guy, but I have to put you through training before I give you to anyone." With that, she stood up, slamming you against the wall of the pocket. "So, you ready to go?" With that, she did what she must have thought of as a playful wiggle of the hips. To you, however, it was a sudden earthquake, flinging you from side to side. Then Sylvia walked out, the sashay of her hips continuing to toss you around like a leaf in a storm.

From the pocket, you could hear the muffled voices of the giant athletes as Sylvia walked out. You heard things like "ass toy" and "insole" being thrown around. Just what were these "traditions"? They all sounded like sexual tortures. What had you gotten into? Then Sylvia left the locker room and went outside. You heard the sound of a car door being unlocked and opened. Sylvia slid in sideways to get into the driver's seat, her posterior pressing the pocket together. You scrambled to the top of the pocket, but Sylvia scooted back, causing her pants to drop incrementally. Your legs and the costume's tail were now stuck between Sylvia's rump and the car seat, and you were holding on to the lip of the pocket, hoping the robotics captain didn't decide to change position. Sylvia patted her pocket and her voice boomed. "You okay down there?" You nodded, and Sylvia, feeling this, retracted her hand. "Good. Here comes my sister."

You heard the passenger side door open, and got your first glimpse of April. She looked like Sylvia, but she had a much pronounced figure. She was wearing olive-green short shorts and a black t-shirt that was stretched thin over her bust. She looked over at her sister and said, "Hey."

Sylvia, thankfully without moving her relatively small butt, turned her head. "Hey. Where were you?"

"In the locker room."

"...but...you're not an athlete."

"Oh, don't play dumb. You know why I was there. There's new mascot, so I thought I'd get to know him."

"How'd you know there'd be a new mascot?"

"The girls were talking about it all week. Katherine wants a foot toy, so does Jamie, Josie wants to mess around with her ass... the usual stuff. I decided I'd just...check it out." April shrugged, putting on her seat belt.

Sylvia sighed. "Alright. I know you're not going to listen, but you're not gonna get the mascot. A bunch of people just aren't sure whether you'd be trustworthy with that kind of responsibility. You might be just like Josie, for all we know."

Her sister drew in a breath, like she wasn't sure if she should go where she was about to go. "You're really not that different though. Remember Adam?"

Sylvia started the car and revved the engine for a couple seconds longer than she should have, but April plowed on. "I've been looking through some of the mascot footage for him that you keep on that flash drive for those Spirit Day videos. You did some really kinky stuff with him. I"

"He was my boyfriend." Sylvia tried to go for a monotone, but pressed as you were under her butt, you suddenly felt like it was ten degrees hotter.

"Well, yeah, but that thing with the string and the Q-tip? Let's just say you're giving me ideas, sis."

"Hnnnggg~" groaned Sylvia, effortlessly pronouncing a tilde. "Shuut. Uup." It was very warm now.

"Alright, fine. But remember that if I find a mascot, I reserve the right to be a total pervert." April grinned, and you hoped she was joking.

The rest of the ride was silent. When they got home, Sylvia got out of the car and pulled her pants up a bit, causing you to tumble into the bottom of the pocket once more to be flung around as she resumed her hip-shaking stride. Finally, when she reached indoors, you heard April yawn hugely and her footsteps receding like she was going up a flight of stairs. The robotics captain immediately plunged a hand in her back pocket and fished you out. She held you close to her lips and whispered, "Don't worry, I'll come back later with something for you to eat. Right now I have some homework to do." With that, she set you down on a chair cushion and walked upstairs.

Some time later, you heard footsteps coming back down the steps. It was Sylvia, and she had a cookie. She gave you the cookie and said, "Alright, from now on. you'll be sleeping...

1. In my bed." -- Sylvia is a gentle giantess, and with time it may become a relationship.

2. In some of my clothes." -- Sylvia is going to be forgetful and clumsy, and you'll slip from her mind every now and then. Including when she puts on her clothes.

3. In my shoe." -- Sylvia is a torturous giantess, and will punish you harshly for any infraction.

4. In an old hamster cage." -- Sylvia is here to train you, and is a professional about it. No sadism, no romance, no clumsiness.

5. In this chair" -- In the morning, April will wake up first and come downstairs to the chair, where she may or may not see you
15.title: In her own pocket

155.content:
"...in this chair." She smiled matter-of-factly at you and walked away, disappearing up the staircase. You for your part were completely dumbfounded, just 24 hours ago you would have never guessed that the mouse mascots were tiny shrunken boys, or that you would become that, or that you would be essentially kidnapped by Sylvia, or that she'd just leave you on a chair in her house. You remembered April's comments about girls wanting you as a foot toy, and Josie wanting you for...ass stuff. You nibbled at the cookie she had left you, more for comfort than for hunger, nervously wondering what would become of you by the end of all this...

"There you are little dude!" You were startled awake by a booming voice. You looked up and were dumbfounded to see Josie, towering over you completely nude! She gave you a smug grin as she placed her hands on her hips. "I know who you are little guy, did you shrink yourself down for me? That's really sweet, like, really dumb, but sweet! Anyways, let's get on with it!" Her shadow overtook you as she leaned over and effortlessly grabbed you in her hand. You felt yourself heating up uncontrollably within your costume, you hated yourself for it but excitement overtook your fear as you gazed at the cheerleader who had captured your heart.

She deftly moved you behind her and you gasped as you saw her massive rear. Before you had any time to appreciate the situation you found yourself being driven straight towards her crack! You tried to plead with her for mercy, but she silenced your squeaks with a booming declaration. "Quit complaining and get in!" You were about to get pushed into-

SLAM!

The sound of a door shutting woke you up on the chair, a few cookie crumbs sitting around you. Still disoriented from your nightmare, it took you a moment to remember where you were, until the sound of footsteps coming down the stairs reminded you, Sylvia! Looking up from the chair, you were instead greeted by the site of April walking past you into the kitchen. You did NOT want to be found by this girl, and quickly pressed yourself as low as you could against the chair cushion, hoping she would pass you by. A few moments passed, and soon April emerged from the kitchen with a bowl of cereal, and to your dismay positioned herself directly above the chair you were hiding on.

Unlike in your dream, April's behind was covered by a pair of denim shorts which quickly slammed down on you. Forgetting the fact you did not want to be found her, you began desperately pushing against her powerful right cheek as it compressed you deep into the cushion below. From around you the sounds of denim rubbing up against plush fabric drowned out most other noise, but you could vaguely hear your unwitting captor crunching on cereal and turning the television on. The friction of her butt moving against the cushion began to heat up all around you.

April wasn't sure why, but the chair was super comfy today, maybe she was just extra tired. As she watched the news headlines go past she groaned and changed channels, too much going on in the world to keep up with! "God there's nothing good on this time of day, I wouldn't need to care about what was on TV if I had a little mascot right now..." Huffing to herself she imagined a tiny mascot begging for help as she undressed, the absolute perfect stress relief for a hard working athlete! As she settled into her chair, she could almost feel an itching sensation between her warming legs...

Choice 1: April finds you and is excited to try out all the things she's fantasized about if she ever got her hands on a mascot. Don't expect her to apologize for using you as a sex toy...if you survive it.

Choice 2: April finds you and wants to try out her fantasies...but she has practice today. Remembering some stories she heard from Katherine, she decides you'll be joining her for the ride...trapped in her panties of course.

Choice 3: Luck smiles upon you today, after a bit more tortuous rubbing she leaves, looks like it's back to seeing what Sylvia has in store for you.
155.title: From one nightmare to the next

info.brief_description: You accepted an offer to be the new school mascot...and got much more than you asked for!
info.description:
This is a take on a rather standard interactive -- the "shrunk at school" story.

You are a student at Metroville High School. The school, for whatever reason, lacks men's sports teams. The school mascot is a mouse, and all the nearby rival schools have cat-themed mascots. This turns out exactly the way you might expect. However, when you're offered the position of mascot, you accept. What's the worst that could happen?

This, apparently.

When you put on the suit before a Friday night game against the rival Chadwell school, you start to shrink! Now you are at the mercy of both the girls' sports teams of your school and the rival school. Can you survive?

Character List: https://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/2130935-Tiny-Mascot-Character-Lis...

If you have an idea for a character, contact me and I'll see if I should add it in.

Rules
No M/M stuff
Characters must be around the same age as the protagonist -- this means they are either in high school or college
Additions must be at least 1,000 characters long, unless it's a choice chapter
Try to keep the story a story
Don't kill the main character off until the story is six non-choice chapters deep.
No animal stuff

Hope you enjoy reading and writing on my interactive!
